Text: Bylakuppe is an area in Karnataka which is home to the Indian town Bylakuppe and several Tibetan settlements (there are several Tibetan settlements in India), established by Lugsum Samdupling (in 1961) and Dickyi Larsoe (in 1969).
Triplets:<Bylakuppe

Bylakuppe: It also shares the border with Eastern part of Coorg district.
